lexUnit.name: sin.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an immoral act considered to be a transgression against divine law.

sentence.text: No need , I submit myself , I own my terrible sin !
To refuse would be a terrible sin .
Christians are used to confessing their sins against God and against other humans , but is it really possible to sin against an ideal ?
This practice is a sin against God and man and stunts the growth of forty million people .
The next thing is to make sure that the sin committed against you is not causing you in turn to sin .

Pilate knew that it would be a sin against God .
Vanity is a sin . "

It was their sin that had caused the death of John Parker .

But the sins are there , in small corners , to be hunted out .

And the sins of the fathers
We were born in sin as as as David said , and shape in inequity .
A sin of omission rather than of commission , quite possibly .
The greatest sin in the world is to have sex when you do n't want it .
